about.title: About
about.description: I’m from Maluku, Indonesia — far from the tech hubs, but deeply passionate about IT, especially mobile app development. Right now, I mainly build apps using Flutter, focusing on clean, efficient code and great user experience.
about.introduction: A proficient software engineer skilled in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), adept at writing clean and structured code, experienced in designing robust and maintainable software architectures for mobile solutions—especially with Flutter—skilled in team management, creating project skeletons, developing core features, managing Git, performing code reviews, solving complex problems, and overseeing app deployments on both the App Store and Play Store.
about.closing: I’m excited to take on new challenges and collaborate on innovative projects. With strong mobile development skills and a commitment to quality, I’m ready to make a meaningful contribution to your team’s and company’s success.

facts.title: Facts
facts.description: Here are some achievements and statistics that highlight my experience and contributions across various projects I have worked on.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: A collection of my core skills, including technical expertise in various programming languages, frameworks, and tools, as well as leadership capabilities in managing development teams, guiding architectural decisions, and ensuring efficient project execution from start to finish.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: My career and educational journey, highlighting the professional experiences and academic background that have shaped my expertise to date.

summary.name: George Richard P.
summary.content: An innovative and result-oriented Senior Mobile Developer with over 5 years of experience in designing, developing, and managing complex mobile applications. Proven ability to lead teams and deliver solid technical solutions.

education.description: Focused on software engineering and application development, building a strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and programming paradigms.
Studied electronics with practical experience in electrical systems, electronic circuits, measurements, and maintenance of electronic devices.

experience.title: Technical Leader
tasks:
Pospay Mobile (PT. Pos Indonesia - Flutter):
Led and managed the development team by coordinating tasks, guiding technical decisions, ensuring timely delivery and milestone adherence, addressing technical challenges with effective solutions, and overseeing app submissions and updates on both the App Store and Google Play.

JakOne Mobile (Mobile Banking - Bank DKI - Flutter):
Directed the development team by overseeing project execution and ensuring timely delivery, designing and implementing core features and application architecture, managing version control, conducting code reviews, resolving technical issues, and overseeing app submissions and updates on the App Store and Google Play.

JakOne Pay (E-Wallet - Bank DKI - Flutter):
Developed the initial application structure and core functionalities, provided technical support and resolved issues to enhance user experience, and managed app submissions and updates on the App Store and Google Play.

JConnect Mobile (Mobile Banking - Bank Jatim - Flutter):
Led the development team by coordinating tasks and guiding technical decisions, created the foundational framework and developed essential features, supervised version control, conducted code reviews, addressed technical problems, and managed processes for App Store and Google Play submissions.

experience.title: Mobile Developer
tasks:
SalesTrax (Sales App - Flutter):
Developed and implemented all features of the application using Flutter, directly coded the UI/UX to ensure a seamless and intuitive user experience, collaborated with the team to integrate backend services and optimize performance, and conducted thorough testing and debugging to meet quality standards.

experience.title: Mobile Developer
tasks: Foodzilla Customer (Food Ordering App - Flutter): Developed all features of the FoodzillaCustomer food ordering application using Flutter, implementing the UI/UX directly from provided designs.

Foodzilla Merchant (Merchant Management App - Flutter): Developed all features of the FoodzillaMerchant application to support merchants in managing orders and menus, implementing the UI/UX directly from provided designs.
DPGPermit (Permit Application - Flutter): Collaborated on the development of the DPGPermit permit application using Flutter, implementing the UI/UX based on provided design specifications.

experience.title: Mobile Developer
tasks: SISTesi (Teaching, Learning, and Student Attendance App - Flutter): Collaborated with the team to migrate the SISTesi application from Android Native to Flutter, developed features and implemented UI/UX based on provided designs.

SISTesi (Teaching, Learning, and Student Attendance App - Android Native): Developed all features for the SISTesi application using Android Native before the migration to Flutter, supported teaching, learning, and student attendance management, and implemented functionality and user interface based on design specifications.

POS Tiketing Gembira Loka Zoo (Ticketing App - JavaFX Desktop): Developed all features for the POS Tiketing Gembira Loka Zoo ticketing application using JavaFX, implementing functionality and user interface elements as per project requirements.

Mobile Hand Held RFID Gramedia (Book Stock Checking App - Android Native): Developed all features for the Mobile Hand Held RFID Gramedia application used for checking book stock at Gramedia stores using Android Native, and implemented functionality and user interface components as specified.

experience.title: Assistant Lecturer
tasks: Mobile Application Programming: Assisted in teaching and guiding students in mobile development.
Introduction to Computer Engineering: Taught basic computer system and programming concepts.

experience.title: Flutter Speaker
tasks: Delivered an engaging presentation on Flutter, its benefits, and real-world applications.
Demonstrated Flutter for cross-platform development and answered audience questions.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A curated collection of my most notable projects, showcasing my expertise in developing a wide range of mobile applications using cutting-edge technologies. These works reflect not only my technical skills but also my adaptability and commitment to delivering impactful digital solutions.

services.title: Services
services.description: Professional services I offer, focusing on mobile app development, software architecture consulting, and application lifecycle management to help your business achieve its digital goals.

items.title: Mobile App Development
items.description: Cross-platform app development using Flutter for iOS and Android, focusing on performance, scalability, and user experience.

items.title: Software Architecture
items.description: Designing clean, modular, and maintainable application architectures (Clean Architecture, SOLID) for long-term projects.

items.title: Code Review & Refactoring
items.description: Analyzing and improving existing codebases for better performance and readability.

items.title: Team Leadership
items.description: Leading and mentoring developer teams, managing Git workflows, and ensuring effective collaboration.

items.title: App Deployment
items.description: End-to-end management of app release and update processes on Google Play Store and Apple App Store

items.title: Technical Consultation
items.description: Providing technical advice to help you choose the best technologies and approaches for your mobile project.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: Apa kata mereka yang pernah bekerja sama dengan saya. Testimoni ini memberikan gambaran tentang etos kerja, keahlian, dan kontribusi saya dalam sebuah tim.

items.quote: George adalah seorang developer yang sangat handal dan cepat belajar. Kemampuannya dalam memecahkan masalah sangat luar biasa.
items.name: Budi Santoso

items.quote: Arsitektur kode yang dibuat George sangat rapi dan mudah untuk dikembangkan lebih lanjut oleh tim. Sangat profesional.
items.name: Citra Dewi

items.quote: Sangat senang bekerja dengan George. Dia tidak hanya ahli secara teknis, tetapi juga seorang komunikator yang hebat.
items.name: Rina Wulandari

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to me for project discussions, collaboration opportunities, or simply to ask a question. I’m always open to connecting and ready to assist you in any way I can.
